name: A dedicated page that gives the user access to household member creation/edit as well as Financial application forms for each household member.

steps.name: the FAA feature configuration is enabled
the user is applying for a CONSUMER role
the primary member has filled mandatory information required
the primary member authorizes system to call EXPERIAN
system receives a positive response from the EXPERIAN
the user answers all the VERIFY IDENTITY  questions
the user clicks on submit button
the Experian returns a VERIFIED response
the user will navigate to the Help Paying for Coverage page
saves a YES answer to the question: Do you want to apply for Medicaidâ€¦

elements.name: new applicant navigation to the FAA Household Info page

steps.name: that the user is on the Application Checklist page
the user clicks CONTINUE
the user will navigate to the FAA Household Infor: Family Members page

name: Start a new Financial Assistance Application and answers questions on Other Questions page

elements.name: User logs in and visits applicant's other questions page

steps.name: a consumer, with a family, exists
is logged in
the user SSN is nil
the user has an eligible immigration status
the user has an age between 18 and 19 years old
the FAA feature configuration is enabled
the user will navigate to the FAA Household Info page
all applicants fill all pages except other questions
the user clicks Other Questions section on the left navigation
the user will navigate to the Other Questions page for the corresponding applicant

elements.name: Pregnancy response within 60 days Yes with information filled and submitted

steps.name: the user answers no to being pregnant
they answer yes to was this person pregnant in the last 60 days question
the user enters a pregnancy end date of one month ago
the user fills out the rest of the other questions form and submits it
the user should see text that the info is complete

name: Start a new Financial Assistance Application and answers questions on health coverage page

elements.name: User logs in and visits applicant's health coverage page

steps.name: a consumer, with a family, exists
is logged in
the FAA feature configuration is enabled
the user will navigate to the FAA Household Info page
they click ADD INCOME & COVERAGE INFO for an applicant
they should be taken to the applicant's Tax Info page (health coverage)
they visit the Health Coverage page via the left nav (also confirm they are on the Health Coverage page)

elements.name: Health coverage form shows after checking an option (currently have coverage)

steps.name: the user answers yes to currently having health coverage
the user checks a health coverage checkbox
the health coverage form should show

they visit the Health Coverage page via the left nav (also confirm they are on the Health Coverage page)

elements.name: Cancel button functionality (currently have coverage)

steps.name: the user answers yes to currently having access to other health coverage
the user checks a health coverage checkbox
the user cancels the form
the health coverage checkbox should be unchecked
the health coverage form should not show

name: Help Paying for Coverage
description:
Consumer will be redirected to Help Paying for Coverage page only when
  Financial Assistance feature is enabled. When FAA feature disabled,
  consumer shall not be able see or access Help Paying for Coverage page.

steps.name: the user is applying for a CONSUMER role
the primary member has filled mandatory information required

steps.name: a consumer exists
the FAA feature configuration is enabled
is logged in
a benchmark plan exists
the user will navigate to the FAA Household Info page

elements.name: Navigation to Family Relationships page via Relationships link

steps.name: at least one other household members exist
all applicants are in Info Completed state
the Family Relationships link displays in the left column of the page
the Family Relationships link is enabled
the user clicks the Family Relationships link
the user will navigate to the Family relationships page

elements.name: Household Info page

steps.name: a consumer exists
the FAA feature configuration is enabled
is logged in
a benchmark plan exists
the user will navigate to the FAA Household Info page

elements.name: Family relationships link does not display on Review your Application page

steps.name: the primary member exists
Family Relationships left section will NOT display
all applicants are in Info Completed state
the user clicks CONTINUE
the user is on the Review Your Application page
Family Relationships left section will NOT display

name: Start a new Financial Assistance Application and answers questions on health coverage page

elements.name: User logs in and visits applicant's health coverage page

steps.name: a consumer, with a family, exists
is logged in
the FAA feature configuration is enabled
the user will navigate to the FAA Household Info page
they click ADD INCOME & COVERAGE INFO for an applicant
they should be taken to the applicant's Tax Info page (health coverage)
they visit the Health Coverage page via the left nav (also confirm they are on the Health Coverage page)

elements.name: User enters health coverage information (currently have coverage)

steps.name: the user answers yes to currently having health coverage
the user checks a health coverage checkbox
the user fills out the required health coverage information
the save button should be enabled
the user saves the health coverage information
the health coverage should be saved on the page

name: This gives the user access to application level navigation for applicants

elements.name: Your Preferences Page

steps.name: the FAA feature configuration is enabled
the user is on FAA Household Info: Family Members page
all applicants are in Info Completed state with all types of income
the user clicks CONTINUE
the user is on the Review Your Application page
the user clicks CONTINUE
the user is on the Your Preferences page

elements.name: Defaulted to "I AGREE"

steps.name: the user is on the Your Preferences page
the answer to "To make it easier to determine my eligibility..." is defaulted to "I AGREE"
the user clicks CONTINUE
the user is on the Submit Your Application page

name: A dedicated page that gives the user access to household member creation/edit as well as Financial application forms for each household member.

elements.name: Household Info page

steps.name: the FAA feature configuration is enabled
a plan year, with premium tables, exists
that the user is on FAA Household Info: Family Members page

elements.name: primary member with NO other household members

steps.name: the primary member exists
NO other household members exist
Family Relationships left section will NOT display

name: This gives the user access to application level navigation for applicants

elements.name: Household Info page

steps.name: the FAA feature configuration is enabled
that the user is on FAA Household Info: Family Members page
the user clicks ADD/EDIT INCOME & COVERAGE INFO button for a given household member
the user will navigate to the Tax Info page for the corresponding applicant.

elements.name: Navigate from Tax Info to Other Income page

steps.name: that the user is on the Tax Info page for a given applicant
the user clicks Other Income section on the left navigation
the user will navigate to the Other Income page for the corresponding applicant.

name: Cost Savings
description:
Consumer will be able to access Cost Savings page only when
  Financial Assistance feature is enabled. When FAA feature disabled,
  consumer shall not be able see or access Cost Savings page.

steps.name: a consumer exists
the consumer is logged in
consumer has successful ridp

elements.name: FAA Feature Is Disabled - Consumer can not see the Cost Savings Link

steps.name: the FAA feature configuration is disabled
consumer visits home page
the consumer will not see the Cost Savings link

name: This gives the user access to application level navigation for applicants

elements.name: Household Info page

steps.name: the FAA feature configuration is enabled
that the user is on FAA Household Info: Family Members page
the user clicks ADD/EDIT INCOME & COVERAGE INFO button for a given household member
the user will navigate to the Tax Info page for the corresponding applicant.

elements.name: Navigate from Tax Info to Other Questions page

steps.name: that the user is on the Tax Info page for a given applicant
the user clicks Other Questions section on the left navigation
the user will navigate to the Other Questions page for the corresponding applicant
